page.title: 10THE PAPER BOY
page.content: The paper boy's name is Bill.I know him through a friend.He collects the papers from Potters Green Newsagents.He delivers twice daily,once in the morning and once in the evening.Each week he knocks on the door to collect the money.He delivers the Sun and Mirror to our house. The paper boy comes on a bike so he can get around more quickly.His round takes him 30 minutes.After his rounds he goes back to the shop and gives in the left-overs and the money he has collected. Bill delivers to certain numbers.He goes to 1,3,5,9,13 Narberth Way.He goes to different streets to deliver.Sometimes when it is raining people ask him if he would like to come in and have a cup of tea.
